job.title: Data Scientist, Contractor, 100% Remote

transform the lives of millions of patients who suffer from serious diseasesnbspnbspBuilding on 25 years of work in awardwinning labsnbspat top academic institutions the platform is supported by a strong IP portfolio and is backed by a top tier syndicate led by Polaris Partners Lightspeed Ventures and aMoonppbrppWe are seeking an experienced creative and motivatednbspstrongData Scientist Contractor 100 remotenbspstrongto join our rapidly growing team In this role you will contribute to the companys platform technology of engineered satellite organs Specifically you will contribute towards our efforts to characterize and optimize the satellite organs using data driven approaches and modeling techniques such as unsupervised and supervised machine learningppbrppThis role is a unique opportunity to join an earlystage wellfunded Biotech startup You will initially report directly to our Senior Data Scientist The position is 100 remote with worknbspstrongup to 20 hours per weekstrongppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppbrpulliWrangle data of multiomic datasets and images in preparation for algorithm development and machine learningliliEvaluate open access databases of sequencing results for disease modelingliliDevelop 2D and 3D image analysis algorithmsliliParse sequencing results and use unsupervised semisupervised and machine learning techniques for outcomes
